mapper.insert: insert into DJBOOK ( isbn, title, ddc, author, publisher, page, info, userid ) values( #{isbn}, #{title}, #{ddc}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{page}, #{info}, #{userid} )
mapper.select: select book.* from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() as rownum ,B.* from DJBOOK B) as book where book.rownum >= #{startPage} and book.rownum <= #{endPage};
